thread.title: This is why you can’t help babbling to your dog like it’s a baby
thread.title_full: This is why you can’t help babbling to your dog like it’s a baby

title: This is why you can’t help babbling to your dog like it’s a baby
text:
11 January 2017 This is why you can’t help babbling to your dog like it’s a baby Competing theories for the use of baby talk on dogs are being untangled and it looks like it's got less to do with cute faces than you think, says Clive Wynne To continue reading this premium article, register or login for free for unlimited access.
